reviews.author: Murasaki
reviews.review: PTLA management appears to have an "absent management" business model. Locations do not appear to have full time staff, and I attempted at this property and others in the Bellingham area to get a walk through of various listed studio and

reviews.author: Marcus Baloutine
reviews.review: Current resident here; the building is pretty nice, though it has some spotty construction in places  one of the elevators makes some pretty concerning noises despite it being new. Management is pretty difficult to get a hold of, even in urgent situations.
